entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Vscode MacOs publish IOS error Invalid Binary #27914
  • Resource files generates warnings when comment file is enabled #27911
  • Can't Create Default Android Device #27910
  • Maui ios device theme vice splashscreen background #27909
  • Functionality to check if GPS/Location is enabled on mobile #27908
  • Preferences problems with DateTime #27903
  • FATAL EXCEPTION when navigating back MAUI 9.0.40 #27901
  • Picker Cancel Button Not Displayed After Orientation Change in .NET MAUI (Android) #27900
    Backlog
  • System.ArgumentNullException Occurs When Assigning Empty Class Object to ListView ItemSource on Windows Platform #27899
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • Inconsistent Picker Popup Layout Rendering in .NET MAUI TimePicker on iOS #27898
    Backlog
  • [IOS] [Mac] Page OnAppearing Is Not Triggered When Navigating Multiple Levels Deep and Returning with PopToRootAsync #27897
    Backlog
  • A Bug with the Android Back Button in 9.x.x versions #27896
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • I7_Pull_to_Refresh - The app hangs after refreshing a few times. #27895
    Backlog

Closed

  • Entry hides while keyboard popup on Android. #19819
    Backlog
  • FilePicker returns null when running iOS app on macOS (not Catalyst) #25661
    Backlog
  • FilePicker on MacCatalyst app is not working (occasionally) #15126
    Backlog
  • Random crashes in iOS and Android #27875
  • Unable to set alternate app (Dynamic Icon Changes) icons in Maui Android #27853
  • Picker TextColor switches to default (black) on hover #13418
  • Issue for loading a image from stream in .NET MAUI #27856
  • Issue with iOS App Crashing in Test Flight #27865
  • Page creation results in System.ArgumentException: Argument_AddingDuplicateWithKey, Microsoft.Maui.Controls.BindableProperty #27819
  • CollectionView SelectedItems Two Way Binding doesn't work #23358
    Backlog
  • Android: Native View not set exception on modal page #27841
  • CarouselView crashes on iOS 15.8.3 when using CarouselViewHandler2 #27818
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Can't Change ToolbarItem FontIconSource Glyph After Load #8295
    Backlog
  • When the user closes the Project screen, the voiceover focus is not returning to the Project work card instead, it is landing on the Hamburger icon.:A11y_.NET 9 template_Home_Screen reader #27465
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Preferences problems with DateTime #27894
  • How to customize the automation peer for W2DGraphicsView #9460
    Backlog
  • IOS: The specified network password is not correct #27802
  • Unspecific exception and broken Windows platform behavior due to Windows package configuration #26946

PullRequests

Created

  • LEGO: Pull request from lego/hb_7241b85a-f216-4d55-a9fa-d8030c736df5_20250219211456120 to main #27915
  • Update DEVELOPMENT.md with net10.0 #27913
  • Fix: Support Clickable Hyperlinks in Labels with TextType HTML (iOS & Android) #27907
    community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 14 #27906
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Fix for flaky UITests in CI that occasionally fail - 3 #27905
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 13 #27904
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Run tests verifying snapshots on mac now that's possible #27893
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [Testing] Re-enable test Issue18193 on MacCatalyst #27892
    area-testing, .NET 9 SR5

Merged

  • [iOS/MacCatalyst] Use newer API in FilePicker #27521
    community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 5 #27564
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Testing] Fix for flaky UITests in CI that occasionally fail - 2 #27878
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Android: Native View not set exception on modal page - fix #27891
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
  • [iOS] Fixed a crash in CarouselViewHandler2 on iOS 15. #27871
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fixed Toolbar IconImageSource not updating with Binding Changes #27402
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5

Updated

  • Simplify test projects and fail faster #27517
    area-testing, .NET 9 SR5
  • remove Dispose call on ShellItemRenderer #27890
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fixed picker allows user input if the keyboard is visible #26382
    community ✨, area-controls-picker, partner/syncfusion
  • Update the comment for the test properties #27306
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Update SkiaSharp #26373
    area-drawing, p/0, .NET 9 SR5
  • [iOS] Fixed ImageButton not honoring Padding value. #26785
    community ✨, area-controls-button, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Windows] Fix for wrong secondary ToolbarItem size #25550
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fixed the FlyoutPage.Flyout Disappearing When Maximizing the Window on Mac Platform #26701
    area-controls-flyoutpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fixed Navigation Toolbar Visibility Issue on Dynamic Flyout Reset in FlyoutPage. #26693
    community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [iOS] Apply Shell.TitleColor to toolbar items #24985
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Testing] - Reenable UITest VerifyInitialEntryReturnTypeChange with Adjustments for Navigation Bar Height Discrepancies on Android #27876
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix Indicator View Causing Looping Issue with CarouselView #27880
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [net10.0] Set `UseRidGraph=false` on Windows (attempt 2) #27679
    community ✨, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [iOS] Pasting long text when the editor has a max length #23877
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • Fixed FontImageSource icon color does not change in the TabbedPage when dynamically updated. #27742
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS/Mac] Fixed the Border Rendering issues in CollectionViewHandler2 #27801
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, collectionview-cv2, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] - Handle Dynamic Updates for CanDrag and AllowDrop in Drag and Drop Gesture #27845
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-gestures, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fixed the SwipeView items were not displayed properly #27399
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • IsNullOrEmpty for Paint not returning true if Color(s) are not set #15668
    area-drawing, community ✨, stale, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR5
  • SelectionLength property update when entry is focused - fix #26213
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-entry, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Testing] Fix flaky tests 6 #27874
    area-testing, testing-flakiness
  • [Android] Map FlowDirection of shell to PlatformView on Android #23473
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fixed the CollectionView scroll the content inside Editor when tapping to get focus on it #27851
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 2 #27500
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 4 #27561
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 10 #27751
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 11 #27764
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 12 #27804
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ContextMenu UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 2 #27405
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Replace MessagingCenter in AlertManager #27888
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-dialogalert, area-controls-dialog, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • Android - Essentials Geolocation | Added support for MslAltitudeMeters #27579
    platform/android 🤖, area-essentials, community ✨
  • Fixed improper rendering of ThumbimageSource in Slider #27472
    community ✨, area-controls-slider, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] - Fix Custom FlyoutIcon from Being Overridden to Default Color in Shell #27580
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [iOS] Transparent button border color when border color is not set #25373
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • Don’t call NSAttributedString with HTML from a background thread #26153
    do-not-merge, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR5
  • Nullability checks for ShellPageRendererTracker #27160
    .NET 9 SR5
  • [Windows] Fixed Shadow not updated when Clipping a View with a shadow #27873
    area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 9 #27743
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for TabBar Navigation does not invoke its IQueryAttributable.ApplyQueryAttributes(query) #25663
    area-navigation, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fix ImageButton Padding the third #25223
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-button, partner/syncfusion/review
